title: Fix server creation button - prevent redirect loop and ensure server provisioning

requirements.text: Fix the server creation button in the user dashboard to prevent it from redirecting back to the interface without creating a server. Ensure that clicking the button properly initiates the server provisioning flow for both free and paid plans.

quotes: I am clicking at to make server but it's come again to interface and the button is not working

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the server creation button does not cause a redirect loop back to the dashboard
Free plan selection immediately creates a server without redirecting
Paid plan selection properly initiates Stripe checkout flow
User receives clear feedback about the server creation process (loading states, success messages)
Server appears in the user's dashboard after successful creation

requirements.text: Debug and fix the form submission or navigation logic in the UserDashboard component that handles server creation. Investigate whether the issue is in the plan selection handler, the server creation mutation, or the Stripe checkout redirect flow.

quotes: I am clicking at to make server but it's come again to interface and the button is not working

acceptanceCriteria: Plan selection properly stores the selected plan before attempting server creation
Error handling displays meaningful error messages if server creation fails
Stripe checkout session creation does not fail silently
Navigation logic correctly handles success and failure states

requirements.text: Add loading and error states to the server creation button to provide user feedback during the provisioning process. Display a loading spinner while the server is being created and show error messages if the operation fails.
acceptanceCriteria: Button shows loading state (spinner or disabled state) while server is being created
Button is disabled during server creation to prevent duplicate submissions
Error messages are displayed clearly if server creation fails
Success feedback is shown when server is successfully created

constraints: Do not modify backend server provisioning logic unless frontend debugging reveals a backend issue
Preserve existing Stripe payment integration and checkout flow
Maintain Internet Identity authentication requirements for server creation
nonGoals: Changing the pricing plans or server specifications
